title: Rito pls ;_;
body:
Rito pls, I wanna guard the sands but I just need 1 rp
I drew you guys a pretty picture! ;_;

replies.body: For future mate, if you send a support ticket explaining the situation you will almost alway be given the tiny bit of rp that you need :) riot is great that way and they respond within a day usually! Hope you got the skin in the end, it is awesome!
Using a small amount of phone credit is the easiest way to get a little rp, and it almost never hurts spending around $3 if you own a phone.
awesome drawing man, too bad you're just a tad late to the party

It's wrong Guardian of the Sands Xerath is currently 1350 on the shop skin tab and in search but some how Riot forgot or something went wrong with the home page that left the skin on the sale 975 rp price.. :)

> [{quoted}](name=Ryool,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=m75a4Acr,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-04T10:37:59.348+0000)
>
> Really? damn

Yeh. i don't mean it in a bad way just saying and nice pic btw.
Ah well, Guess I'll just have to grab some more some time, and cheers :D
